request.description: if you want to produce notif into the RMQ channel put `consumer_info: null` and fill the `producer_info`, to consume notifs just put `producer_info: null` and fill the `consumer_info`
if you want to produce notif into the RMQ channel put `consumer_info: null` and fill the `producer_info`, to consume notifs just put `producer_info: null` and fill the `consumer_info`
